scripts.clean:firebase: node firebase/scripts/kill-emulators.js && rm -rf firebase/firebase-export-* firebase/*.log firebase/functions/*.log *.log
scripts.super-clean: npm run clean:firebase && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf */node_modules && rm -rf */*/node_modules && npm run clean -ws --if-present
scripts.dev:prep: npm run clean:firebase && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:prep && concurrently "cd webapp && npm run watch" "cd firebase && npm run link-webapp && npm run start-emulators"
